Package org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor

Class AutomatonCanvas<T extends Automaton>

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor.ScrollablePanel
org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor.AutomatonCanvas<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the automaton
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable, AutomatonListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
AltAutomatonCanvas, FSACanvas, GameCanvas, TwoWayAltAutomatonCanvas
public abstract class AutomatonCanvas<T extends Automaton>
extends ScrollablePanel
implements java.awt.event.ComponentListener, AutomatonListener
An AutomatonCanvas is a panel containing an automaton drawer and automaton tools that can draw something. It relies on the drawer to draw the automaton on the canvas.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
See Also:
Serialized Form

    Modifier and Type Class Description
    (package private) class  AutomatonCanvas.MyIdleDrawer
    This is a drawer that can paint information about the state under the mouse cursor when the mouse is idle.

    • isAdaptive

      public boolean isAdaptive()
      Returns true if this automaton canvas is in adaptive mode, that is, the zoom level will be adjusted automatically such that the whole automaton can be seen in this canvas.
